sentences.en: ‘ Think positive !’ she advised herself.
sentences.cn: “往好的方面想！”她劝自己。

sentences.en: ‘Are you sure about that?’ ‘Positive.’
sentences.cn: “那事你能肯定吗？”“能。”

sentences.en: a positive charge
sentences.cn: 正电荷

sentences.en: A positive pregnancy test soon confirmed her intuitive feelings.
sentences.cn: 阳性孕检结果很快证实了她的直觉。

sentences.en: At least something positive has come out of the situation.
sentences.cn: 至少这个情况也产生了一些积极的东西。

sentences.en: Cultivating a positive mental attitude towards yourself can reap tremendous benefits.
sentences.cn: 培养一种自信的积极心态会让人受益匪浅。

sentences.en: Good day to you, Bernard! It's a positive delight to see you.
sentences.cn: 你好，伯纳德！见到你真高兴。

sentences.en: He prefers to focus on the positive.
sentences.cn: 他更愿意关注积极面。

sentences.en: Her husband became much more positive and was soon back in full-time employment.
sentences.cn: 她丈夫变得积极多了，并且很快又干起了全职工作。

sentences.en: I was positive things were going to turn out fine.
sentences.cn: 我确信事情最终会好起来的。

sentences.en: I'm as positive as I can be about it.
sentences.cn: 我对它有绝对的把握。

sentences.en: It’s a relief to know that something positive is being done.
sentences.cn: 知道正在采取积极的措施让人宽心。

sentences.en: It’s been a difficult time but, on the positive side , I feel physically fine.
sentences.cn: 日子过得不容易，不过从好的方面看，我的身体状况还不错。

sentences.en: It’s been a very positive experience for her.
sentences.cn: 那对她来说是一次非常有益的经历。

sentences.en: It's really a simple numbers game with negative and positive numbers.
sentences.cn: 它其实就是正负数的简单数字游戏。

sentences.en: Officials are awaiting positive identification before charging the men with war crimes.
sentences.cn: 在以战争罪起诉这些人以前，官员们一直在等待他们身份的核实。

sentences.en: Positive action was required.
sentences.cn: 要求采取积极行动。

sentences.en: Pupils should be helped to adopt a positive approach to the environment.
sentences.cn: 应帮助学生对环境采取积极的态度。

sentences.en: Remember, keep a positive attitude and good things will happen.
sentences.cn: 记住：保持乐观的心态，好事自然会发生。

sentences.en: The agreement should have very positive results in the long term.
sentences.cn: 从长远来看，这个协议将会产生非常积极的影响。

sentences.en: The athlete received a two-year suspension following a positive drug test.
sentences.cn: 该运动员因尿检结果呈阳性而被停赛两年。

sentences.en: The parting from his sister had a positive effect on John.
sentences.cn: 和姐姐分开对约翰来说有好处。

sentences.en: the positive contribution to the community made by many older people
sentences.cn: 许多老年人为社区做出的积极贡献

sentences.en: the power of positive thinking
sentences.cn: 正向思考的力量

sentences.en: The rural environment was having a positive effect on the children’s health.
sentences.cn: 乡村环境对孩子们的健康有好处。

sentences.en: The test results came back positive.
sentences.cn: 化验结果呈阳性。

sentences.en: This energy could be much better spent taking some positive action.
sentences.cn: 这些精力若用于采取某些积极行动的话，可能会更值得。

sentences.en: TV can be a positive influence .
sentences.cn: 电视也会有好的影响。

sentences.en: We need to take positive steps to improve the situation of families in poverty.
sentences.cn: 我们需要采取积极措施来改善贫困家庭的状况。

sentences.en: Women should be portrayed in a more positive light .
sentences.cn: 应该从更正面的角度来描绘女性。

sentences.en: Work on the positive, creating beautiful, loving and fulfilling relationships.
sentences.cn: 致力于好的方面，努力营造美好的、友爱的、令人满意的关系。

sentences.en: Working abroad should be an exciting and positive experience for all concerned.
sentences.cn: 在海外工作对所有相关人员来说都应该是一段让人兴奋而愉快的经历。

sentences.en: Write down all the positive things about your life.
sentences.cn: 记下生活中所有好的事情。

sentences.en: You have to do everything you can. You have to work your hardest. And if you do, if you stay positive, then you have a shot at a silver lining.
sentences.cn: 你必须全力以赴，最大限度地去努力。如果你这么做，并且保持乐观，你就会看见乌云背后的幸福线。

words.tran_cn: 实证主义；实证论；积极性；武断
实证主义者；实证哲学家

phrases.tran_cn: 阳性反应；积极的结果（positive result的复数）

trans.tran_cn: 积极乐观的，建设性的，拥护的，正面的，明确的，有把握的，阳性的，完全的，大于零的，带正电的
trans.tran_en: if you are positive about things, you are hopeful and confident, and think about what is good in a situation rather than what is bad
The positive in a situation is the good and pleasant aspects of it
